original_text: And they shall spread upon them a cloth of scarlet, and cover the same with a covering of badgers' skins, and shall put in the staves thereof.
korean_text: 홍색 보자기를 그 위에 펴고 그것을 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮은 후에 그 채를 꿰고

sentences.original_text: And they shall spread upon them a cloth of scarlet
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것들 위에 주홍색 천을 펼칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: and cover the same with a covering of badgers' skins
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 것을 오소리 가죽 덮개로 덮을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall put in the staves thereof
